name: XEZABO
description:
CAN YOU CLEAN THE WHOLE CITY FROM INVADING ROBOTS IN JUST TWO MINUTES?

PLAY AND FIND OUT!

XEZABO IS A THIRD PERSON SHOOTER GAME WHICH YOU TRY TO DESTROY ALL ROBOTS  AT THE LEVEL IN GIVEN TIME.  ALSO YOU HAVE TO  WATCH YOUR HEALTH BECAUSE IT WILL DECREASE CONSTANTLY. THE ONLY WAY TO RE-FILL YOUR HEALTH AND AMMO IS ENTERING  THE SHIELD ( SHIELD IS THE PLACE THAT GAME START) IT MEANS YOU HAVE TO COME BACK TO RE-FILL YOUR ENERGY AND AMMO AND ALSO MANAGE THE TIME WISELY TO DESTROY ALL THE ROBOTS

CONTROLS :

WASD  CONTROL

RIGHT CLICK  FIRE

LEFT CLICK  CHANGE CAMERA PERSPECTIVE
